means: 干洗（衣物）( dry-clean的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Natural-filled duvets must be dry-cleaned by a professional.
sentence.Network_cn: 天然填充的羽绒被必须交由专业人士干洗。

sentence.Network_en: This garment must be dry-cleaned only.
If the suit won't wash, it must be dry - cleaned.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果这套西服经不住水洗, 就得干洗了.

list.abs: 服装英语 - 志在蓝天 ... 不可漂白 No bleach / Do not Bleach 一般干洗 dryclean 专业干洗 Professionally Dryclean.
...这一问题所经历的评价和实验过程，并通过实验证明了：干刻清洗(Dry Clean)工艺可以替代普通的开腔清洗，以达到了不开腔也能 …
舞台英文术语 ... ironing table 熨衣板 dry cleaning 干洗 steamer 蒸汽机.
纺织专业英语词汇 ... 汗渍牢度 perspiration 干洗牢度 drycleaning 光照牢度 light.

entry.def: When things such as clothes are dry-cleaned, they are cleaned with a liquid chemical rather than with water.

example.ex: Natural-filled duvets must be dry-cleaned by a professional.
example.tran: 天然填充的羽绒被必须交由专业人士干洗。

auth_sentence.content: Drain, refresh in iced water and pat dry.

auth_sentence.content: Mouth breathing causes a dry mouth and cracked lips.
